name: .8CA File Extension
type_name: TI-84 Plus C Image Var Format
summary: Learn about .8CA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image format, known as Image Var, used by TI-84 Plus C graphing calculators for background images; uses 16-bit color.

content: The 8CA Image Var file is created when converting JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIF or GIF images using TI Connect software. The image is resized to 83 x 133 pixels when it is converted to an Image Var file and is stored in Archive memory. Each calculator model has its own default images and only ten images can be stored on the TI-84 Plus CE calculator.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
